channel.description: Thoughts on Big Data Analytics, Machine Learning, and Product Development

item.title: How Hadoop and Spark Are Transforming Data Warehousing
item.description: Traditional data warehouses cannot handle big data. Hadoop, Spark, Impala, Parquet and SQL on Hadoop will play big role in data warehouse modernization.

item.title: Releasing Soon! Learning Elastic Stack 6.0
item.description: The book Learning Elastic Stack 6.0 is available for pre-order. Here is what to expect from the book.
